page.title: Partners
page.subtitle: List of our authorized members & partners

partners.title: Our Solution Partner
partners.1: Sisense is a leading business intelligence and analytics company that specializes in empowering organizations to make data-driven decisions. Founded in 2004, the company is known for its innovative approach to data integration and visualization, offering a platform that simplifies the complexity of data analysis. Sisense provides tools for aggregating and analyzing large volumes of data, enabling businesses to uncover insights and drive strategic growth. With a focus on scalability and ease of use, Sisense has become a preferred choice for companies seeking to leverage their data more effectively.
partners.2: Google is a leading global technology corporation, providing innovative solutions and advanced cloud services for businesses. With Google Workspace, Google Cloud Platform, and powerful AI/ML tools, Google helps organizations optimize workflows, enhance productivity, and drive digital transformation. From email and collaboration to cloud computing and artificial intelligence, Google delivers a comprehensive toolkit that enables businesses to thrive in the digital era. With a focus on security, scalability, and continuous innovation, Google has become a trusted partner for companies seeking to maximize the potential of modern technology.
partners.3: Viettel Cloud is a leading cloud computing service provider in Vietnam, offering innovative and reliable solutions tailored for businesses of all sizes. With a focus on security, scalability, and flexibility, Viettel Cloud empowers organizations to harness the full potential of digital transformation. From cloud storage and computing to advanced data analytics and AI services, Viettel Cloud delivers cutting-edge technology backed by exceptional support, ensuring that businesses can thrive in an increasingly digital world.
partners.4: Cloud AZ is a leading information technology company in Vietnam that specializes in providing digital transformation solutions and cloud services. Since its establishment, CloudAZ has supported over 500 businesses in migrating to cloud platforms, resulting in significant cost savings of millions of USD in operational expenses. Notably, in May 2021, CloudAZ became the first Premier Partner of Google Cloud in Vietnam, highlighting its strong growth and reputation in the cloud services sector.

others.title: Other Authorized Partners & Members
others.description: As we operate in Vietnam, we take great pride in being an authorized partner & member of various local organizations. Our commitment is to deliver exceptional services and solutions to businesses in our region, reflecting our dedication to excellence and local engagement.
